mapper.sql: a.INFO_SEQ, a.USR_CDE, a.LIVE_PROVINCE , a.LIVE_PROVINCE_CODE , a.LIVE_CITY , a.LIVE_CITY_CODE , a.LIVE_AREA, a.LIVE_AREA_CODE, a.LIVE_ADDR, a.INDIV_EMP_NAME, a.INDIV_EMP_PROVINCE , a.INDIV_EMP_PROVINCE_CODE , a.INDIV_EMP_CITY, a.INDIV_EMP_CITY_CODE, a.INDIV_EMP_AREA, a.INDIV_EMP_AREA_CODE, a.INDIV_EMP_ADDR, a.DUTY, a.DUTY_CODE, a.INDIV_EMP_TEL, a.CRT_DT, a.MDF_DT, a.RMK, a.MON_INCOME, a.HIGH_DEGREE
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM CL_USR_INFO a WHERE a.USR_CDE = #{USR_CDE}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CL_USR_INFO( USR_CDE, LIVE_PROVINCE , LIVE_PROVINCE_CODE , LIVE_CITY , LIVE_CITY_CODE , LIVE_AREA, LIVE_AREA_CODE, LIVE_ADDR, INDIV_EMP_NAME, INDIV_EMP_PROVINCE , INDIV_EMP_PROVINCE_CODE , INDIV_EMP_CITY, INDIV_EMP_CITY_CODE, INDIV_EMP_AREA, INDIV_EMP_AREA_CODE, INDIV_EMP_ADDR, DUTY, DUTY_CODE, INDIV_EMP_TEL, CRT_DT, MDF_DT, RMK, MON_INCOME, HIGH_DEGREE ) VALUES ( #{USR_CDE}, #{LIVE_PROVINCE }, #{LIVE_PROVINCE_CODE }, #{LIVE_CITY }, #{LIVE_CITY_CODE }, #{LIVE_AREA}, #{LIVE_AREA_CODE}, #{LIVE_ADDR}, #{INDIV_EMP_NAME}, #{INDIV_EMP_PROVINCE }, #{INDIV_EMP_PROVINCE_CODE }, #{INDIV_EMP_CITY}, #{INDIV_EMP_CITY_CODE}, #{INDIV_EMP_AREA}, #{INDIV_EMP_AREA_CODE}, #{INDIV_EMP_ADDR}, #{DUTY}, #{DUTY_CODE}, #{INDIV_EMP_TEL}, #{CRT_DT}, #{MDF_DT}, #{RMK}, #{MON_INCOME}, #{HIGH_DEGREE} )
